Articles.Content:
Listen, squad. Your game is buggy. I lost my game for some stupid reason, mate. What I mean is when I start the game via steam and go into 'resume game' there's nothing there! What the hell, squad? And when I go to my saved folder via steam... there are 10 different saved games! Like what? How did you let this happen, squad?

Edited July 11, 2016 by KasperVld
Removed profanity from topic title

How about contacting Steam tech support? 

Also, this thread has been moved to the support subforum.

Please see here. We'll need logs and other info to help troubleshoot.

Thanks

On 6/12/2016 at 4:22 AM, Krissases said:

Listen, squad. Your game is buggy. I lost my game for some stupid reason, mate. What I mean is when I start the game via steam and go into 'resume game' there's nothing there! What the hell, squad? And when I go to my saved folder via steam... there are 10 different saved games! Like what? How did you let this happen, squad?

First up, complaining isn't going to fix the game, secondly, go to that forum post Claw linked, and explain the problem, then your game can be fixed.

Welcome to the forums btw, and I hope your experience gets better.

Can I just request this thread be linked to everybody who asks for public release testing?

Because this is EXACTLY what I mean when I say that public release testing doesn't work (anymore).

10 hours ago, Melfice said:

Because this is EXACTLY what I mean when I say that public release testing doesn't work (anymore).

The game isn't currently in public release testing.

12 hours ago, Claw said:

The game isn't currently in public release testing.

No. And this topic is why it should never happen again. Because filtering out "bugreports" like these would take up too much time, and clutter the actual useful ones.

2 hours ago, Melfice said:

No. And this topic is why it should never happen again. Because filtering out "bugreports" like these would take up too much time, and clutter the actual useful ones.

It was their decision to create a open beta for access to anyone on Steam, if you disliked the beta, you could have opted out at any time. Regardless, it's not your game and not your decision. You had a solution to a problem, if you had one. This post is simply aggravated about his game not working, which I feel is an easy solution.

-------------------------------------------------

@Krissases,  when you open your game and open resumed saved games, is the entire list blank with the cancel, delete, ok buttons not working? If so, I am familiar with this bug as it's an old one. If this is the case I can help, but I need to know if it is. If not, I think I can still provide help.
